headline: Nigerian, Queer and Looking for a Church
abstract: Nontraditional Nigerian churches are safe spaces for young Christians — if they aren’t L.G.B.T.Q.
lead_paragraph: LAGOS, Nigeria — Services at the Tribe Lagos church in Nigeria are held in a chic, urbane cafe resembling many others like it in the area: a long, fairly spacious room with stark white walls and light casings made from woven raffia palms.
